name: @tiberriver256/codex-alfred
description: Slack butler that bridges Slack threads to Codex CLI via the Codex TypeScript SDK.

scripts.alfred:restart: zsh -lc 'if [ -n "$ALFRED_PID" ]; then kill "$ALFRED_PID" && sleep 1; fi; eval "$(mise activate zsh)"; DATA_DIR="${ALFRED_DATA_DIR:-$HOME/mom-data}"; ALFRED_DATA_DIR="$DATA_DIR" nohup codex-alfred --log-level debug > "$DATA_DIR/alfred.log" 2>&1 & echo $!'
